resources.title: Unmasking Autism
resources.author: Dr. Devon Price
resources.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding masking and the autistic experience, especially for late-diagnosed adults.

resources.title: NeuroClastic
resources.author: Multiple Autistic Contributors
resources.description: A platform by and for autistic individuals, featuring articles, personal stories, and community support.

resources.title: The Autistic Self-Assessment
resources.author: Embrace Autism
resources.description: Comprehensive self-assessment tools for adults suspecting they might be autistic, with detailed explanations.

resources.title: Divergent Mind
resources.author: Jenara Nerenberg
resources.description: Explores how neurodivergent women are redefining what it means to be 'normal' and thriving authentically.

resources.title: Autistic Women & Nonbinary Network
resources.author: AWN Community
resources.description: Support and resources specifically for autistic women and nonbinary individuals, including late diagnosis support.

resources.title: Sensory-Friendly Products Database
resources.author: Autistic Community
resources.description: Curated list of sensory-friendly clothing, noise-canceling headphones, stim toys, and accommodations.

resources.title: Autism in Adulthood Journal
resources.author: Mary Ann Liebert, Inc.
resources.description: Peer-reviewed research focusing specifically on autism in adults, including diagnosis and support.

resources.title: Drama Queen
resources.author: Sara Gibbs
resources.description: A powerful memoir about receiving an autism diagnosis at 30 and unlearning decades of masking.

resources.title: r/AutismInWomen
resources.author: Reddit Community
resources.description: Active Reddit community for autistic women and those questioning, with daily support and shared experiences.

resources.title: Spoon Theory Tracker App
resources.author: Various Developers
resources.description: Apps for tracking energy levels (spoons) to manage autistic burnout and pace yourself sustainably.

resources.title: AANE - Autistic Adults Support
resources.author: AANE Team
resources.description: Provides support groups, coaching, and resources specifically for autistic adults and late-diagnosed individuals.

resources.title: Loud Hands: Autistic People Speaking
resources.author: Julia Bascom (Editor)
resources.description: Collection of essays by autistic writers about identity, advocacy, and living authentically autistic.

resources.title: Autistic Adults Connection Group
resources.author: Local Chapters
resources.description: In-person and virtual support groups for autistic adults, organized by region and special interests.

resources.title: AAC Communication Apps
resources.author: Various Developers
resources.description: Augmentative and Alternative Communication apps for non-speaking or situationally non-verbal autistic adults.

resources.title: Directory of Autism-Affirming Therapists
resources.author: Therapist Collective
resources.description: Vetted directory of therapists who practice neurodiversity-affirming approaches, not ABA or conversion therapy.

resources.title: I Think I Might Be Autistic
resources.author: Cynthia Kim
resources.description: Practical guide for adults who suspect they might be autistic, covering self-assessment and next steps.

resources.title: Autistic Burnout Recovery Workbook
resources.author: Kieran Rose
resources.description: Structured workbook for recognizing, understanding, and recovering from autistic burnout.

resources.title: The Autism Spectrum Discord
resources.author: Discord Community
resources.description: Active Discord server for autistic adults to connect, share experiences, and support each other daily.

resources.title: Workplace Accommodation Request Templates
resources.author: Disability Rights Advocates
resources.description: Pre-written templates for requesting autism-related accommodations at work, with legal guidance.

resources.title: Autistic Coaching Services
resources.author: Autistic Coaches
resources.description: Life coaching by autistic coaches for autistic adults, focusing on unmasking and authentic living.
